MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: This mapping loads data to STG_AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER staging target table.
MAPPING.NAME: m_STG_AVYX_DMD_DRIVER

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: SQ fetches data from source AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.DEMAND_WEEKEND_DATE, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.PLANT, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.DEMAND_TYPE, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.STYLE, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.COLOR, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.ATTRIBUTE_CD, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.SIZE_CD, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.CURRENT_QTY, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.PLAN_DATE, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.SCHEDULE_METHOD, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.SCHEDULE_RUN, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.PRIORITY_SEQUENCE, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.DEMAND_DRIVER, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.DEMAND_SOURCE, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.RULE_NUMBER, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.SELLING_STYLE_CD, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.SELLING_COLOR_CD, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.SELLING_ATTRIBUTE_CD, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.SELLING_SIZE_CD, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.PLANNING_TM_FNC, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.REVISION_NO, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.DEMAND_POLICY, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.CREATE_DATE, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.UPDATE_DATE, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.PLANNER_CD, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.CAPACITY_ALLOC, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.SEW_ALLOC, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.CUT_ALLOC, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.FINISH_ALLOC, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.SRC_ALLOC, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.MAKE_OR_BUY_CD, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.ATTRIBUTION_IND, AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER.ATR_ALLOC FROM AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Expression to convert and load default values to the required target table fields.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_AVYX_DMD_DRVR

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Lookup on DAY_DIMENSION to get AS_OF_DATE
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_DAY_DIMENSION

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT DAY_DIMENSION.AS_OF_DATE as AS_OF_DATE, '1' as DUMMY FROM DAY_DIMENSION WHERE TRUNC(DAY_DIMENSION.DAY_DATE)= TRUNC(SYSDATE-7)

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Lookup to get PRIMARY_DC based on condition provided.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_STYLE

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT STYLE.PRIMARY_DC as PRIMARY_DC, STYLE.STYLE_CD as STYLE_CD FROM STYLE

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: SQ fetches data from source AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Expression to convert and load default values to the required target table fields.
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_AVYX_DMD_DRVR

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Lookup on DAY_DIMENSION to get AS_OF_DATE
INSTANCE.NAME: LKP_DAY_DIMENSION

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Lookup to get PRIMARY_DC based on condition provided.
INSTANCE.NAME: LKP_STYLE
